name: Aim High for High School
description: Offers a summer program for Middle School Students (6-8) that focuses on project-based academics, social emotional learning, outdoor activities and field trips. Provides students new opportunities to try new things, foster connections with friends and teachers to ensure readiness for high school.
fullDescription: Offers a summer program for Middle School Students (6-8) that focuses on project-based academics, social emotional learning, outdoor activities and field trips. Provides students new opportunities to try new things, foster connections with friends and teachers to ensure readiness for high school.
whatTheyOffer: Offers a summer program for Middle School Students (6-8) that focuses on project-based academics, social emotional learning, outdoor activities and field trips. Provides students new opportunities to try new things, foster connections with friends and teachers to ensure readiness for high school.
howToGetIt: To apply, visit https://aimhigh.org/summer-2024/ . For further assistance with the application process, call 415-551-2301 or e-mail admissions@aimhigh.org.
address: 2030 Harrison Street, 3rd floor, San Francisco , CA, 94110
agency: Aim High for High School - Summer Enrichment Program
